overview: It's 2020, a woman has been in lockdown at home for six months and she's beginning to go stir-crazy. She spots a young girl in a neighbour's backyard, but when she inquires with the neighbours about the girl, they don't know anything about her. As the story unravels, along with the main character's mind, the audience learns more about the girl and if she really is just a figment of the imagination.
title: Find Me
